issue.body:

commits.message:
Upd youtube.com

https://github.com/piquark6046/uAssets/commit/fedf97d71c4bd8b840e07b469cd4596c227a2071

A channel's main video player shows advertisement but no ad video. (only black screen)

Environment:
Browser: Firefox 117.0b9
AdGuard: Browser Extension 4.1.57
Filters: AdGuard Base, AdGuard TPF, AdGuard URL Tracking filter and List-KR
Browser advanced config:
privacy.resistFingerprinting true
browser.cache.disk.capacity 0
browser.cache.disk.enable false
browser.cache.disk_cache_ssl false
IP address: Mullvad VPN jp-tyo-wg-001
Google Account: logged out
URL: https://www.youtube.com/@bunhong_bam/featured

Co-authored-by: Yuki2718 <bh.ssp220@gmail.com>

||horoscopeget.com^$all

||luckbywin.com^$all
||manuel-utilisation.com^$all
||mysafeprize.com^$all
||opgoldprize.com^$all
||pickuprize.com^$all
||promowealth.com^$all
||pythoni.immo^$all
||solidprize.com^$all

Strange strategies by the owner of the domains, who've seemingly managed to buy different Amazon IPs for most, if not all, 57 domains, make IP blocking imfeasible.

issue.title: Block almostmy.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.57

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

vhresa.almostmy[.]com (Mobile UA required)

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I have observed almostmy[.]com having been used for phishing for 2 months with changing subdomain. The latest report from a phishing hunter: `https://twitter.com/AP_Zenmashi/status/1695289979117957536`.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![almostmy](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/58900598/931e24db-4fc0-4fc2-84d0-f80acbb54620)



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
